15163189945613276.Text: I've spoken to Gadayn Andarys about the note of his I found on the ground. He tells me that he has been in love with Eraldil for many months, but has not had the courage to tell her. He would like me to speak to her and tell her of his love.

5979200653260922740.Text: I have agreed to speak with Eraldil about Gadayn. He suggested I might find her in the Hlaalu Waistworks.

285573229139524747.Text: I've decided not to get involved with Gadayn and his love for Eraldil.

128495314261064778.Text: I've talked to Eraldil about Gadayn Andarys and his love for her, and the response was not positive. She detests the poor trader, and wants nothing to do with him. She sees him as much too common for herself, and more fitting for someone like her lowly cousin, Glathel.

18664254422968412480.Text: Gadayn Andarys was heartbroken by the news that Eraldil wanted no part in his affections, but has been ready for this eventuality.

1663311305229578217.Text: Gadayn has had a potion crafted that will cause the wood elf to fall madly in love with him. He would like me to deliver it to him.

2123518264928032753.Text: I have agreed to deliver the love potion to Eraldil.

34764981103318875.Text: I decided not to deliver the potion to Eraldil, but instead suggested to Gadayn that he might consider turning his attentions to Glathel. Gadayn seems open to the idea.

10218800192827453.Text: Eraldil has accepted the potion from Gadayn, thinking it is his way of apologizing for his behavior.

78461118162264076.Text: I have told Gadayn about delivering the potion, and he was overjoyed. He gave me a light ring as a token of his thanks.

16056122671717524623.Text: I have returned to Gadayn's shop, and it seems the love potion has not worked out as planned. Eraldil has fallen in love with him, but he is unhappier than he could have imagined. He finds the wood elf annoying, clinging, and vapid. A shame for the trader, but he got what he wished for.

28330595259444260.Text: Upon returning to Gadayn's shop, it appears he took my advice and courted the homely Glathel. The trader seems truly happy with the woman, and expressed his deepest gratitude. He also rewarded me with a Flamemirror Robe.

2714681673226926262.Text: For the Love of a Bosmer
